Question 1 (Q01):
How did you feel emotionally while interacting with the VR scene? Describe any specific emotions you experienced, such as joy, fear, excitement, or calmness.

Question 2 (Q02):
Did the VR scene make you feel immersed and connected to the environment? Explain how this affected your overall emotional experience.

Question 3 (Q03):
Were there any moments during the VR experience that made you feel uncomfortable or overwhelmed? If so, please describe those moments and your emotional response.
